title: Creamed Mushrooms
introduction: These creamy mushrooms are heavenly as a side dish with steak, or they can be an appetizer, served over thin slices of toast.

ingredients.description: Salt and freshly ground black pepper

instructions: 1. Wipe the mushrooms clean with damp paper towels. Snap off the stems of the mushrooms and trim the ends where soil collects. Cut the mushrooms into thick slices.

2. In a large skillet, melt the butter over medium heat. Add the shallot and cook until softened, about 3 minutes. Add the mushrooms and salt and pepper to taste. Cook, stirring often, until the mushrooms are lightly browned, about 10 minutes.
3. Stir in the cream and bring to a simmer. Cook until the cream is thickened, about 2 minutes. Serve hot or warm.
